name: Mahjong Easter for Raspberry Pi
description:
This solitaire version of Mahjong is quick to learn but takes a long time to master! Choose from a gaggle of different backgrounds, tilesets, and layouts. The ancient solitaire game at it's finest. Ask the computer to reveal the best moves. Backup moves and save your current game for playback at another time. Play guaranteed winnable or totally random games. Keep track of your playing time and other game stats at all times. WARNING: This game is addicting!

This special edition features adorable Easter-themed backgrounds and tilesets!

Features

  • Easter-themed graphics
  • 51 layouts to play
  • 10 backgrounds
  • 5 tilesets
  • Computer hints feature
  • Backup moves button
  • Save game and restart games
  • The Easter Bunny!
